title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-5.5 - Structural systems
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-5.5 - Structural systems

State Regulations
(a) inspectors shall observe and report on the following: (1)
any deteriorated and/or damaged
structural component including the building foundation and framing; (2)
the floor structure; (3)
the wall structure; (4)
the ceiling structure; (5)
the roof structure. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
§§
197-5.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
